title: Capital X
lyrics:
Do you do you do you feel alive oh yes I
Will you make a stand or run and hide
I see that everywhere I look
Far and wide I see those signs
Can you check your head or build a wall

We got the piper leading rats to a fall

Now we're just speaking to the phantom in a call

I see those signs



I'll cross my fingers for you

And if this future becomes true

I'll cross my fingers for you

And then I'll bury it and mark

Bury it and mark it



Capital X

Capital X

Capital X

Dig it up



Do you do you practice what you preach

I see you keep on steady lying through your teeth

I guess I always wanna question what we teach

I see those signs



Never will you ever find the prize (no never)

The rabbit hole is deeper in disguise

Put it in a circle hypnotise

And see those signs



I'll cross my fingers for you

Because this future's become true

I'll cross my fingers for you

And then I'll bury it and mark

Bury it and mark it



Capital X

X

Capital X

X



(X) The meek shall inherit the Earth

I bleed so bleak (X)

I've been bleak from birth



(Capital X) The meek shall inherit the Earth

I bleed so bleak (X)

I've been bleak from birth
